actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To impose temporarily a 25 percent duty on imports of wheat gluten and to require the administering authority to initiate an investigation under title VII of the Tariff Act of 1930 with respect to wheat gluten.

summary.text: Emergency Wheat Gluten Act of 1996 - Imposes a 25 percent ad valorem duty on wheat gluten imported from European Union countries. Directs the administering authority to initiate a countervailing duty investigation with respect to such wheat.

titles.title: To impose temporarily a 25 percent duty on imports of wheat gluten and to require the administering authority to initiate an investigation under title VII of the Tariff Act of 1930 with respect to wheat gluten.
